fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Meddle with your surroundings during the night, redirecting all of your visitors into themselves.
-Hide a player’s ability during the night. While you are alive, they will not be able to use that ability. This is not a roleblock and only takes effect after the current night ends. (2-shot)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you fail to redirect someone who visits you, you will instead roleblock them.
-You may choose to unhide a player’s ability at any time, giving it back to them, but this will not refund a shot of hiding.
